Text: Thanks Gronpar - we miss you at Demonoid - hope the leg is healing up fine so you can get back on the ice soon - and appreciate all your hard work.

Thank you, vMorr; leg's almost healed. Back to work next week (a bit crippled, but anyway). No skating: spring has come in this country and I like that much better.
The reason you missed me at Dem. is obvious, there's said enough about that!
Keep sharing the music!!
